max_calldata_length.description: Validates that a transaction has signature length less than or equal to this value.

max_signature_length.description: Validates that a transaction has calldata length less than or equal to this value.

validate_non_zero_l1_gas_fee.description: If true, validates that a transaction has non-zero L1 resource bounds.

validate_non_zero_l2_gas_fee.description: If true, validates that a transaction has non-zero L2 resource bounds.
